page.title: 06BLACKWELL GOLF CLUB
page.content: Blackwell Golf Club is a private club run by a committee of members. The original course, built in 1893, was of nine holes. The present course, completed in 1922 is of eighteen holes with and additional practice area. The club employs a Secretary and typist, who run the administration, a steward,stewardess and assistant, who look after the club house, a professional golfer, four greenkeepers and a cleaner. There are about 400 members. The course covers 102 acres and is crossed by four public footpaths. Club house facilities include changing rooms and showers, dining room and bar.Ther is a golf shop run by the club professional.
